author: nacho
msg: Addign a light error page to Admin app, trying to preclude
stacktraces when Admin context is not trusted..

author: costin
msg: Fix for 3745 - thanks Stefan Eissing for finding the bug.
doRead() should return -1 on end of stream, and available should be used
only if is known ( -1 means unknown length, read until EOF ).

author: costin
msg: Fixes from Johannes Brodwall <johannes@brodwall.com> on EmbededTomcat and

author: larryi
msg: Add unless="not.standalone" to some tests so they will be skipped when
testing via a web server.  We don't need to be testing how they react
to bad requests. In some cases they hang anyway.  Ant 1.4 is required
for the tests to actually be skipped.

author: larryi
msg: Update to set a "not.standalone" property if port 80 is being used.  With
Ant 1.4, the test-tomcat.xml will be able to skip certain tests that cause
